General.Name: Guangxi Liuzhou Pharm Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangxi LiuYao Group Co., Ltd engages in the wholesale and retail of pharmaceutical products in China. It also offers smart medicine value-added services. The company was founded in 1981 and is based in Liuzhou, China.

2.Name: Ms. Wen Jie  Shen
2.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of Board of Directors
